column4: is it possible to see what configuration files have been changed from doing an apt-get install?
basically echos the file to stdout (the screen)
stdout is what the config files refer to as the screen?
basically it displays the file on screen...scrolls to the end of the file
in your case it will be the apt log
that will let you thumb through it...
I think that was my response the first time I did it too :)
